item.title: [sta] Blue Sun's Zenith
item.description:
Instant

Target player draws X cards. Shuffle Blue Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.

item.title: [sta] Compulsive Research
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

item.title: [sta] Brainstorm
item.description:
Instant

Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

item.title: [sta] Whirlwind Denial
item.description:
Instant

For each spell and ability your opponents control, counter it unless its controller pays {4}.

item.title: [sta] Time Warp
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

item.title: [sta] Tezzeret's Gambit
item.description:
Sorcery

({U/P} can be paid with either {U} or 2 life.)

Draw two cards, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

item.title: [sta] Strategic Planning
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

item.title: [sta] Negate
item.description:
Instant

Counter target noncreature spell.

item.title: [sta] Mind's Desire
item.description:
Sorcery

Shuffle your library. Then exile the top card of your library. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost. (If it has X in its mana cost, X is 0.)

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [sta] Memory Lapse
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

item.title: [sta] Counterspell
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell.

item.title: [sta] Agonizing Remorse
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it or a card from their graveyard. Exile that card. You lose 1 life.

item.title: [sta] Village Rites
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Draw two cards.

item.title: [sta] Tendrils of Agony
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.title: [sta] Tainted Pact
item.description:
Instant

Exile the top card of your library. You may put that card into your hand unless it has the same name as another card exiled this way. Repeat this process until you put a card into your hand or you exile two cards with the same name, whichever comes first.

item.title: [sta] Sign in Blood
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [sta] Inquisition of Kozilek
item.description:
Sorcery

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

item.title: [sta] Eliminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature or planeswalker with converted mana cost 3 or less.

item.title: [sta] Duress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [sta] Doom Blade
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonblack creature.

item.title: [sta] Dark Ritual
item.description:
Instant

Add {B}{B}{B}.

item.title: [sta] Crux of Fate
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose one —

• Destroy all Dragon creatures.

• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.

item.title: [sta] Chaos Warp
item.description:
Instant

The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sta] Increasing Vengeance
item.description:
Instant

Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, copy that spell twice instead. You may choose new targets for the copies.

Flashback {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sta] Grapeshot
item.description:
Sorcery

Grapeshot deals 1 damage to any target.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.title: [sta] Faithless Looting
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [sta] Claim the Firstborn
item.description:
Sorcery

Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

item.title: [sta] Urza's Rage
item.description:
Instant

Kicker {8}{R} (You may pay an additional {8}{R} as you cast this spell.)

This spell can't be countered.

Urza's Rage deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, instead it deals 10 damage to that permanent or player and the damage can't be prevented.

item.title: [sta] Thrill of Possibility
item.description:
Instant

As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.

Draw two cards.

item.title: [sta] Stone Rain
item.description:
Sorcery

Destroy target land.

item.title: [sta] Shock
item.description:
Instant

Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [sta] Mizzix's Mastery
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile target card that's an instant or sorcery from your graveyard. For each card exiled this way, copy it, and you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Mizzix's Mastery.

Overload {5}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

item.title: [sta] Abundant Harvest
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [sta] Lightning Bolt
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

item.title: [sta] Infuriate
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.

item.title: [sta] Weather the Storm
item.description:
Instant

You gain 3 life.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [sta] Snakeskin Veil
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. It gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.title: [sta] Regrowth
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [sta] Putrefy
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [sta] Primal Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Target player gains 7 life.

• Put target noncreature permanent on top of its owner's library.

• Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

• Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

item.title: [sta] Natural Order
item.description:
Sorcery

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.

Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [sta] Lightning Helix
item.description:
Instant

Lightning Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

item.title: [sta] Krosan Grip
item.description:
Instant

Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)

Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

item.title: [sta] Harmonize
item.description:
Sorcery

Draw three cards.

item.title: [sta] Growth Spiral
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

item.title: [sta] Electrolyze
item.description:
Instant

Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sta] Despark
item.description:
Instant

Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

item.title: [sta] Cultivate
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

item.title: [sta] Channel
item.description:
Sorcery

Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {C}.

item.title: [sta] Adventurous Impulse
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
